mapper.select: select a.KEY as key, a.VAL as val, a.KEYDESC as keyDesc, a.DATATYPE as dataType, a.DEMODATA as demoData, a.DATADATE as dataDate, a.UNIT as unit from CDADATA a join ( select key, max(DATADATE) as DATADATE from CDADATA WHERE VAL is not null and VAL != '-2147483648' group by key ) b on a.key = b.key and a.DATADATE = b.DATADATE WHERE a.VAL is not null and a.VAL != '-2147483648'
select KEY as key, VAL as val, KEYDESC as keyDesc, DATATYPE as dataType, DEMODATA as demoData, DATADATE as dataDate from CDADATA WHERE KEY=#{key}
mapper.update: UPDATE CDADATA SET KEY=#{key}, VAL=#{val}, DATADATE=#{dataDate}, UPDATEDATE=sysdate WHERE KEY=#{key}
